content.text:
Identify free/cheap data sources for historical player stats across all major sports (NBA, MLB, NFL, NHL, etc.).

Research and compile:
1. Free data sources (APIs, downloads, scrapable sites)
2. Low-cost data providers (<$50/month)
3. What data each source provides (game logs, box scores, advanced stats, play-by-play, injury reports)
4. API access methods and rate limits
5. Data quality and reliability
6. Historical depth available
7. Any legal/terms of use considerations

Save findings to /root/clawd/memory/data-sources.md with:
- Source name and URL
- Data types available
- Cost (free/cheap)
- Access method (API, download, scraping)
- Quality notes
- Pros/cons

Focus on sources that provide the granular player-level data needed for prop betting modeling.
